name: The Curse of Two Eyed Tony
name_original: The Curse of Two Eyed Tony
description:
Two Eyed Tony, That's Captain Tony to you and me, has spent his years plundering and looting and having the time of his life, but time has caught up with him and the goddess of the seas has placed a cures on old Tony's pride and joy, the Lady Naehope, and she's sailing to her doom with a full crew on board!
You, as TET, (though I'd save some time and use TET instead of typing Two Eyed Tony every time), must now collect all the treasure chests scattered across the oceans and return them the the enchanted castle and get onboard before the Lady Naehope is swallowed up by the curse of the deep.

Controls are:

ARROW Keys - move the rowboat about the ocean.

'E' - Drops rum bottles in the path of the Lady Sparrow to slow her down and change her course.

'Q' - drops the treasure into the drop-pot next to the castle

'SPACE' - Swaps camera from rowboat to the Lady Sparrow

Row over the top of treasure to tow them to the castle (one at a time I'm afraid, the tow rope is only thin, so thin in fact you'd struggle to see it with the naked eye)

Row over the green crystal rum depot's to refill yer rum supply

Swing your arms in time to the music to feel a bit piratey!

Good luck Captains!

Created for Kenney Jam 2020

Future development is planned for this game.
